titleStmt.title: Church reformation, tenderly handled in fovre sermons, preached at the weekly lecture in the parish church of Great Yarmouth. / By John Brinsley.
titleStmt.author: Brinsley, John, 1600-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. M. for Iohn Burroughes, at the Signe of the Golden-Dragon, neare the Inner-Temple Gate in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
